pages.text: Sieving Crushed Netherrack and using the Emerald Mesh will output:$(br)-Gold Piece: 0.15, 0.075$(br)-Quartz Dust: 0.1, 0.05$(br)-Blaze Powder: 0.075, 0.0375$(br)-Cobalt Piece: 0.03$(br)-Crimson Iron Dust: 0.03$(br)-Benitoite Crystal: 0.005$(br)-Emeraldite Shards: 0.005$(br)-Netherite Scrap: 0.005$(br)-Raw Pendorite: 0.005
